Class dishSearchChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.google.visualization.datasource.DataSourceServlet
          • Stats.dishSearchChart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.visualization.datasource.DataTableGenerator, java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class dishSearchChart
extends com.google.visualization.datasource.DataSourceServlet
    Author:
    John

    This deals with preparing the data to be sent to the charts, it's heavily influenced from the
    tutorials available with the google visualisation package.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • generateDataTable

        public com.google.visualization.datasource.datatable.DataTable generateDataTable(com.google.visualization.datasource.query.Query query,
                                                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This is an already defined method in the google packages, hence it's override statement.
        It creates a new Datatable, arraylist of collumnDescription type and stores details.
        It is used to create a table and populate it with data. I have added some more methods that add the
        data and return it back to this method so that it can be inserted into the
        new chart data.

      • getDataForTable

        public void getDataForTable()
        This method deals with getting the data for the tables,
        It queries the statsDishes table in the database and returns the values required
        in two array lists of their respective types, ints and strings.

        The lists are then iterated through with a 2 for loops and are added to the data / collumns
        etc as above.

      • isRestrictedAccessMode

        protected boolean isRestrictedAccessMode()


        required by the google documentation
        Overrides:
        isRestrictedAccessMode in class com.google.visualization.datasource.DataSourceServlet
